entry.title: Polygon and Fantom Services Restored After Phishing Attack ￼
entry.summary: Blockchain networks Polygon and Fantom suffered a DNS attack Friday that directed users to malicious websites created to steal the keys to their digital wallets.

entry.title: Crypto Broker Voyager Suspends Withdrawals and Trading After 3AC’s Loan Default
entry.summary: Voyager, a crypto broker, has suspended withdrawals, trading, deposits and loyalty rewards from its app following Three Arrows Capital’s default on its loan.

entry.title: FTX Reaches Deal to Acquire BlockFi for Up to $240M as CeFi Lenders Buckle Under Market Pressure
entry.summary: FTX, the second-biggest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has signed an option to purchase crypto lender BlockFi for as much as $240M, BlockFi CEO Zac Prince said Friday.

entry.title: Ryder Ripps Is in Deep Trouble. Here’s Why (#BAYC)
entry.summary: Ryder Ripps. It’s a name you’re probably sick of hearing now. And you’d probably rather he went away but the truth is double R has been at this art game longer than you’d imagine and NFTs are simply the latest internet curiosity he’s turned his very specific artistic gaze towards. entry.title: Axie Infinity Guilds Rush to Aid Players as GameFi Pioneer Craters Axie Players and Guilds Hope Origin Upgrade Will Revive Beloved Game
entry.summary: Axie Players and Guilds Hope Origin Upgrade Will Revive Beloved Game
